definition: biting and grinding food in your mouth so it becomes soft enough to swallow, to chew food
details:
noun
- biting and grinding food in your mouth so it becomes soft enough to swallow
= synonyms: chewing, mastication, manduction
- a wad of something chewable as tobacco
= synonyms: plug, chaw, cud, quid, wad
verb
- to chew food
= synonyms: jaw, masticate, manducate
